feed.title: [META] Mailing list etiquette Re: BIPS proposal for implementing AML-KYC in bitcoin

entry.title: [META] Mailing list etiquette Re: BIPS proposal for implementing AML-KYC in bitcoin
entry.summary: The SNR of a mailing list is becoming ridiculous and individuals should refrain from trolling and feeding into it. It's important to remember that messages are sent to hundreds or thousands of people, so the content should be thought through before hitting "send." This information was originally posted on the bitcoin-dev mailing list in August of 2015.
